sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[EmployeeKey] 
,[DW_ID_DimEmployeeWork] AS [SRC_DW_ID_DimEmployeeWork]
,[DW_AuditKey] AS [SRC_DW_AuditKey]
,[DW_Batch_Created_ID] AS [SRC_DW_Batch_Created_ID]
,[DW_Batch_Updated_ID] AS [SRC_DW_Batch_Updated_ID]
,[DW_CreateDate] AS [SRC_DW_CreateDate]
,[DW_UpdateDate] AS [SRC_DW_UpdateDate]
,[DW_Valid_From] AS [SRC_DW_Valid_From]
,[DW_Valid_To] AS [SRC_DW_Valid_To]
,[DW_EarlyArrived] AS [SRC_DW_EarlyArrived]
,[DW_IsCurrent] AS [SRC_DW_IsCurrent]
,[DW_IsDeleted] AS [SRC_DW_IsDeleted]
,[DW_CRC] AS [SRC_DW_CRC]
,[Source_Updated_TS] 
,[Source_Created_TS] 
,[Source_Updated_By] 
,[Source_Created_By] 
,[EmployeeID] 
,[EmployeeRecord] 
,[SourceSystem] 
,[JobIndicator] 
,[EmployeeStatus] 
,[Sex] 
,[BirthDate] 
,[FirstName] 
,[LastName] 
,[Name] 
,[LocalPhone] 
,[MobilePhone] 
,[FAX] 
,[WorkplacePhone] 
,[AlternativePhone] 
,[RoomNumber] 
,[PostalRoomNumber] 
,[Email] 
,[UserID] 
,[SeniorityDate] 
,[AnniversaryDate] 
,[StandardHours] 
,[OriginalHireDate] 
,[LatestHireDate] 
,[TerminationDate] 
,[LocationID] 
,[WorkAddress] 
,[WorkZipCode] 
,[WorkPostalDistrict] 
,[BusinessTitleCode] 
,[BusinessTitle] 
,[BusinessTitleShort] 
,[BusinessStatisticsCode] 
,[BusinessFunction] 
,[JobStatus] 
,[JobCode] 
,[JobCodeDescription] 
,[EmployeeClass] 
,[SalaryAdminPlan] 
,[SalaryGrade] 
,[PayGroup] 
,[SalaryType] 
,[EmployeeType] 
,[DepartmentID] 
,[DepartmentDescription] 
,[DepartmentDescriptionShort] 
,[ManagerEmployeeID] 
,[AONR] 
,[Company] 
,[CompanyDescription] 
,[CompanyDescriptionShort] 
,[EmployeeTypeCode] 
,[TerminationInfo] 
,[EmployeeStatusDescription] 
,[SexDescription] 
,[SkillGroup] 
,[IsManager] 
,[SquadID] 
,[SquadDescription] 
,[SquadDescriptionShort] 
,[IsAgileCoach] 
,[IsProductOwner] 
,[ApprovedEmailDomain] 
,[ChapterAreaID] 
,[ChapterAreaDescription] 
,[ChapterAreaDescriptionShort] 
 
FROM Dimension.[DimEmployee]

query.value:
SELECT 
`NUUDL_SourceCreated` 
,`NUUDL_SourceUpdated` 
--,`FIRMA` 
--,`ENHED` 
--,`VIRKNR` 
,`LOENNR` 
--,`LOEBENR` 
--,`STATUS` 
,`ANUMMER` 
,`EMAIL` 
--,`STEDNR` 
--,`AONR` 
,`KONTORFORK` 
--,`KONTORNAVN` 
--,`FYSADR` 
--,`POSTADR` 
--,`STIL_KODE` 
--,`INITIALER` 
,`NAVN` 
--,`FORNAVN` 
--,`MELLEMNAVN` 
--,`EFTERNAVN` 
--,`ADRESSE` 
--,`ADRLIN_1` 
--,`ADRLIN_2` 
--,`ADRLIN_3` 
--,`POSTNR` 
--,`KOEN` 
--,`ANS_DATO` 
--,`AFG_DATO` 
--,`FOD_DATO` 
--,`START_ORLOV` 
--,`SLUT_ORLOV` 
--,`OMRAADE` 
--,`TLFLOK` 
--,`TLFDIR` 
--,`TLFMOB` 
--,`TLFALT` 
--,`TLFFAX` 
--,`TLFOPS` 
--,`TLFUDL` 
--,`TJEGREN` 
--,`KATEGORI` 
--,`AFLFORM` 
--,`TILHOER` 
--,`ARBSTEDKD` 
--,`AENDRET` 
--,`OPDATERET` 
--,`NORMTID` 
--,`TRGRUPPE` 
--,`BANKREGNR` 
--,`BANKKONTONR` 
--,`FAGGRUPPE` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
--,`BIZ_BatchCreatedID` 
--,`BIZ_BatchUpdatedID` 
,`NUUDL_PKLatest` 
,`NUUDL_BaseSourceFilename` 
,`NUUDL_BaseBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_BaseProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
 
FROM dai.ref.`pdindividge`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'
	AND NUUDL_ValidTo > '2023-01-01'

SELECT 
`NUUDL_SourceCreated` 
,`NUUDL_SourceUpdated` 
,`ABM_NR` 
,`ABONNEMENT_ID` 
,`AENDRINGSSTATUS` 
,`AFTALE_NR` 
,`BEM_TEKST` 
,`FAST_SPAERRING` 
,`FJERNTELEFON` 
,`FORBIND_ID` 
,`GEN_DUT` 
,`KUNDESAG_KD_AFS` 
,`KUNDESAG_KD_OPR` 
,`LID` 
,`LID_STATUS` 
,`MOMSFRI_MRK` 
,`NAVNE_NR` 
,`NBR_DUT` 
,`OP_SOEGEFELT` 
,`ORDRE_NR_AFS` 
,`ORDRE_NR_OPR` 
,`PRIS_SOEJLE` 
,`SIDST_OPD_INIT` 
,`SIDST_OPD_TSTMP` 
,`SLUT_DATO` 
,`START_DATO` 
,`TLF_BOG_OPT_KD` 
,`TRAFIK_OPSM_MRK` 
,`UDSTIL_LID_MRK` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`BIZ_BatchCreatedID` 
,`BIZ_BatchUpdatedID` 
,`NUUDL_PKLatest` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
 
FROM cu.`AFTALE_LID`
 WHERE NUUDL_ValidTo>='2017-01-01' AND NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
`NUUDL_SourceCreated` 
,`NUUDL_SourceUpdated` 
,`ABONNEMENT_ID` 
,`AENDRINGSSTATUS` 
,`AFSAET_KODE` 
,`ANTAL_PRODUKT` 
,`ARBITRAER_PRIS` 
,`B_SLUT_DATO` 
,`FUNKTIONS_NR` 
,`IDRIFT_MRK` 
,`KUNDE_PRIS_AFT_NO` 
,`LID_LOEBE_ID` 
,`ORDRE_NR_OPR` 
,`PROD_LID_AFT_ID` 
,`PRODUKT_ELM_NR` 
,`PRODUKT_GRP_NR` 
,`RABAT_LOEB` 
,`RABAT_LOEB_SAT` 
,`REGNINGS_BEM` 
,`SIDST_OPD_INIT` 
,`SIDST_OPD_TSTMP` 
,`START_DATO` 
,`TEKST_MRK` 
,`UNDERLEV_ID` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`BIZ_BatchCreatedID` 
,`BIZ_BatchUpdatedID` 
,`NUUDL_PKLatest` 
,`K_MRK_DATO` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
 
FROM cu.`PROD_LID_AFT`
 WHERE NUUDL_ValidTo>='2017-01-01' AND NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
`active_from` 
,to_json(`billing_data`) `billing_data` 
,to_json(`changed_by`) `changed_by` 
,`city` 
,to_json(`contact_hour`) `contact_hour` 
,`country` 
,`email_address` 
,`end_date_time` 
,to_json(`extended_attributes`) `extended_attributes` 
,`fax_number` 
,`id` 
,`is_active` 
,`phone_ext_number` 
,`phone_number` 
,`postcode` 
,`preferred_contact` 
,`preferred_notification` 
,`push_notification_group_key` 
,`ref_id` 
,`ref_type` 
,`social_network_id` 
,`start_date_time` 
,`state_or_province` 
,`street1` 
,`street2` 
,`type_of_contact` 
,`type_of_contact_method` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:floor AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_floor` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:suite AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_suite` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_IsDeleted` 
,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
 
FROM dai.@{activity('Lookup_Source_Schema_Name').output.firstRow.SourceSchemaName}.`cimcontactmedium`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
`active_from` 
,to_json(`billing_data`) `billing_data` 
,`billing_synchronization_status` 
,`brand_id` 
,to_json(`changed_by`) `changed_by` 
,`customer_category_id` 
,`customer_number` 
,`customer_since` 
,`end_date_time` 
,`engaged_party_description` 
,`engaged_party_id` 
,`engaged_party_name` 
,`engaged_party_ref_type` 
,to_json(`extended_attributes`) `extended_attributes` 
,`external_id` 
,`id` 
,`idempotency_key` 
,`last_nps_survey_ref` 
,`name` 
,`net_promoter_score` 
,to_json(`ola_ref`) `ola_ref` 
,to_json(`org_chart_ref`) `org_chart_ref` 
,`portfolio` 
,`start_date_time` 
,`status` 
,`status_reason` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:brandName AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_brandName` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:employeeBrand AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_employeeBrand` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:employeeId AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_employeeId` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:migration_date AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_migration_date` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:migration_phase AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_migration_phase` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:migration_source AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_migration_source` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:migrationFlag AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_migrationFlag` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_IsDeleted` 
,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest` 
 
FROM dai.@{activity('Lookup_Source_Schema_Name').output.firstRow.SourceSchemaName}.`cimcustomer`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'
